metadata.confidence: MEDIUM - based on industry patterns, not customer research

journey_overview.typical_timeline: 1-4 weeks from first touch to signed project
journey_overview.primary_conversion_path: Portfolio → Contact form → Call → Proposal → Signed

1_unaware.description: Brand marketer isn't actively searching. Content needs are handled (for now).

customer_state.feeling: Comfortable, maybe slightly frustrated with status quo
customer_state.doing: Working with existing vendors or in-house

trigger_to_next_stage: Leadership asks 'why does our content look dated?'
1_unaware.playground_opportunity: Instagram presence keeps Playground visible for when trigger hits

2_problem_aware.description: Something went wrong or needs have grown. Current solution isn't working.

customer_state.thinking: We need better content / a better partner

2_problem_aware.content_needs: Not actively consuming - still internal problem recognition

3_solution_aware.description: Actively looking for a photographer/production partner. Comparing options.

customer_state.thinking: Who's out there? Who's good? Who fits our budget?
customer_state.doing: Googling, asking network, browsing portfolios, checking Instagram

3_solution_aware.playground_opportunity: THIS IS WHERE THE WEBSITE MATTERS MOST

content_needs.portfolio: Show work similar to what they need
content_needs.differentiation: Why Playground vs. agencies vs. freelancers
content_needs.process: What's it like to work together?

key_questions_to_answer: Have they done work like mine?

4_product_aware.description: They've found Playground and are deciding if it's worth reaching out.

customer_state.thinking: This looks promising. Are they the right fit?
customer_state.doing: Deep-diving portfolio, reading about page, checking Instagram

trigger_to_next_stage: See a specific project similar to their need

content_needs.about_story: Who is Barrett? What's the approach?

key_questions_to_answer: Can they do specifically what I need?
Are they in my budget ballpark?
drop_off_risks: Can't figure out how to contact
Seems too expensive or too cheap
Website feels outdated (doesn't match portfolio quality)

5_most_aware.description: Decided Playground is worth a conversation. Taking action.

customer_state.thinking: Let's see if they're available and what this would cost
customer_state.doing: Filling out contact form, sending email, DMing on Instagram

key_questions_to_answer: What info do they need from me?

key_conversion_points.success_factor: Hero communicates 'creative production' immediately. Work visible above fold.
Work impresses. Easy to find contact. No friction.
Form is short. Confirmation is clear. Barrett responds fast.

must_haves: Portfolio front and center (this is the product)
nice_to_haves: Services page with clarity on offerings
avoid: Long text blocks before showing work
